fields.name: core_id
fields.title: OSC Id
fields.description: The Id number of the item (a GUID).

fields.name: core_name
fields.title: OSC Name
fields.description: The name of the item.

fields.name: core_name_display
fields.title: OSC Display Name
fields.description: The display name of the item, if different from its regular name.

fields.name: core_abbreviation
fields.title: OSC Abbreviation
fields.description: The abbreviated name of the item, if different from its regular name.

fields.name: core_description_short
fields.title: Description Short
fields.description: Short description of the item (max 256 chars).

fields.name: core_description_full
fields.title: Description Full
fields.description: Full description of the item.

fields.name: core_tags
fields.title: OSC Tags
fields.description: The key value pairs of this item.

fields.name: core_datetime_created
fields.title: OSC DateTime Created
fields.description: Date and time item was created (ideally in ISO format YY-MM-DDDD UTC time).

fields.name: core_datetime_lastmodified
fields.title: OSC DateTime Last Modified
fields.description: Date and time item was last modified (ideally in ISO format YY-MM-DDDD UTC time).

fields.name: core_lastmodifier_user_id
fields.title: OSC Last Modifier User ID
fields.description: References the user Id that last modified the item (or the creator, if unmodified).

fields.name: core_is_active
fields.title: OSC Is Active
fields.description: Describes whether the item is considered 'active' in the system of record.

fields.name: core_is_deleted
fields.title: OSC Is Deleted
fields.description: Describes whether the item was deleted in the system of record (to support soft deletes).

fields.name: core_datetime_deleted
fields.title: OSC DateTime Deleted
fields.description: If the item was deleted in the system of record, this records the date and time of that event (ideally in ISO format YY-MM-DDDD UTC time). Otherwise, NULL.

fields.name: core_deleter_user_id
fields.title: OSC Deleter User ID
fields.description: If the item was deleted in the system of record, this references the user Id that deleted the item. Otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_tenant_id
fields.title: OSC Tenant ID
fields.description: Id number for tenant (to support multitenancy). Default is 1.

fields.name: core_culture
fields.title: OSC Culture
fields.description: Culture used for multilingualism/internationalization, max 5 characters. See https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4646 and https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/fundamentals/runtime-libraries/system-globalization-cultureinfo). Default is 'en', neutral English culture.

fields.name: core_checksum
fields.title: OSC Checksum
fields.description: A checksum of the item's value, as set by the system of record which determines what are the key values for hashing. It could alternatively reference a Git commit hash.

fields.name: core_version
fields.title: OSC Version
fields.description: A version number of the item, as determined perhaps by the system of record or the destination storage system. The exact format is flexible. It could reference a Git commit hash if versioning is managed by a Git source control system.

fields.name: core_seq_num
fields.title: OSC Sequence Number
fields.description: A positive number assigned to the item to help determine its relative position in search or list displays. Exact implementation details are left to the system developer.

fields.name: core_translated_from_id
fields.title: OSC Translated From ID
fields.description: If this item was translated from another (i.e. its culture is different from the data/system default), list that ID. Otherwise, leave NULL.

fields.name: core_is_published
fields.title: OSC Is Published
fields.description: Describes whether the item was published in the system of record. Exactly what this means is left to the data/system integrator. Leave NULL if publishing information is not relevant or implemented.

fields.name: core_datetime_published
fields.title: OSC DateTime Published
fields.description: If the item was published in the system of record, this records the date and time of that event (ideally in ISO format YY-MM-DDDD UTC time). Otherwise, NULL.

fields.name: core_publisher_user_id
fields.title: OSC Publisher User ID
fields.description: If the item was Published in the system of record, this references the user Id that published the item. Otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_coordinates_longitude
fields.title: OSC Geo Longitude
fields.description: The Longitude coordinate of the item (such as -76.0948245)

fields.name: core_geo_coordinates_latitude
fields.title: OSC Geo Latitude
fields.description: The Latitude coordinate of the item (such as 36.229972) if known, otherise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_altitude
fields.title: OSC Geo Altitude
fields.description: The altitude of an item (in meters above the WGS84 ellipsoid), otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_altitude_confidence
fields.title: OSC Geo Altitude Confidence
fields.description: The accuracy of the altitude value at a 95% confidence level, expressed in metres (positive numbers only), otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_overture_features
fields.title: OSC Overture Features
fields.description: The Overture Foundation json features present at this location (an array of json items, if known), otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_h3_index
fields.title: OSC Geo H3 Index
fields.description: The Uber H3 geocoded id of this item's geographic location at the specified H3 resolution, otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_geo_h3_resolution
fields.title: OSC Geo H3 Resolution
fields.description: The Uber H3 geocoded resolution of this item's geographic location (1 to 16), otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_asset_type_id
fields.title: OSC Asset Type ID
fields.description: the Asset Type of this item.

fields.name: core_owner_bloomberg_id
fields.title: OSC Owner Bloomberg ID
fields.description: the owning entity's Bloomberg ID of this item if known, otherwise NULL.

fields.name: core_owner_lei_id
fields.title: OSC Owner LEI ID
fields.description: the owning entity's LEI ID of this item if known, otherwise NULL.
